title: Invesco launches two new Nasdaq-focused ETFs in Europe
description: Invesco has unveiled two new ETFs in Europe targeting stocks traded on Nasdaq. The Invesco Nasdaq-100 Swap UCITS ETF, listed on LSE, provides synthetically replicated exposure to the Nasdaq 100, the world’s foremost large-cap growth index. The fund complements the issuer’s existing $5.1bn physical product on the same index. Invesco’s second launch is the Invesco Nasdaq Next Generation 100 UCITS ETF, listed on LSE and Xetra. This fund targets mid-cap companies directly outside of the Nasdaq 100.
